name: CPR Training Pro
overview:
CPR Training Professionals provides accredited group CPR certification and First Aid training classes throughout Southern California including Orange County, Los Angeles, San Diego and Riverside County.

We offer customized CPR certification and First Aid training courses that meet your group, organization or business needs. Our goal is to give you the skills and confidence you’ll need to make decisions and take action in an emergency situation.

Our CPR certification and First Aid training courses are approved by federal, state, and local agencies and exceed Federal OSHA requirements. We use the most current CPR, AED and First Aid training that incorporates standards of care that meet OSHA Guidelines for First Aid and the Emergency Cardiovascular Care Guidelines.

We have been teaching people to save lives for over a decade. Our highly trained CPR and First Aid Instructors are professional emergency educators who have the experience and knowledge to ensure everyone becomes a trained lifesaver!

Onsite Group CPR & First Aid Training CPR Training Professionals offers several levels of on-site group CPR certification and First Aid training classes for a wide variety of audiences.

CPR/AED /First Aid for the Workplace – Meets Federal OSHA requirements, 2 year certification

Child Care CPR/ Pediatric First Aid – Approved by CA EMSA for use in licensed childcare facilities, 2 year certification with EMSA validation stickers

Adult, Infant and Child CPR/ First Aid for the Community - 2 year certification

American Red Cross Training CPR Training Professionals offers several levels of American Red Cross training classes at our facility or yours.

Lifeguard Certification - 2 year certification Lifeguard Re-certification / Review - 2 year certification Lifeguard Instructor Certification - 2 year certification Water Safety Instructor Certification – 2 year certification
